resources.string: Max retry count for reliable message
Expected response count for reliable message
No bluetooth device found, enable location and retry?

1. On phone[1] click [EXPORT] to export storage as json file to sdcard/TelinkBleMesh directory

 2. Copy json file to phone[2]'s sdcard

 3. Click [select file] to select json file , then click [IMPORT] to load json file and sync storage

 4. Back to home page, and waiting for mesh reconnect

string-array.name: share_flow
string-array.item: 1. On phone[1] click [EXPORT] to export storage as json file to sdcard/TelinkBleMesh directory
2. Copy json file to phone[2]\'s sdcard
3. Click [select file] to select json file , then click [IMPORT] to load json file and sync storage
4. Back to home page, and waiting for mesh reconnect

resources.string: Enabled for scanning , provisioning and key-binding one by one; Disabled for selectable networking.
Enabled for default bound when key-binding;

Database file should be formatted as:
 [uuid0] [oob0]
 [uuid1] [oob1]
 [uuid2] [oob2]
 \.\.\.

 (uuid and oob array length should be 16)
Use No-OOB if device UUID not found when device is static-OOB supported

DLE selected action will change mesh upper layer segmentation bound: 

	Disabled -> segment bound is 11; 

	Enabled -> segment bound is 225. 


See [UNSEGMENTED_ACCESS_PAYLOAD_MAX_LENGTH_DEFAULT] and [UNSEGMENTED_ACCESS_PAYLOAD_MAX_LENGTH_DLE] in [NetworkingController].
Telink private provision profile, scan and setting device by direct connected mesh device.
1.Select at least one network key \n2.Select destination(JSON file or QRCode)\n3.Click EXPORT
1.Select source(JSON file or QRCode) \n2.If the selected source is JSON file, select the target file \n3.Click IMPORT
